programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle voiture) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle voiture»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La chasse au trésor) S1 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pas très bien) S1 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Pas très bien»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (A la recherche des gorilles !) S6 (n°21)
programme.desc: «A la recherche des gorilles !»When Primatologists Zooli and Gil searching the rainforest for a Silverback Gorilla, they're chased into an ancient temple by a robotic silverback... who turns out to just be a tiny marmoset guarding a sanctuary of mountain gorillas!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une journée de sport avec Blue) S3 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Une journée de sport avec Blue»Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La nuit des tortues / La régate de Santiago) S1 (5/21)
programme.desc: «La nuit des tortues / La régate de Santiago»When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Time Capsule) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Time Capsule»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Ma petite dent) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Ma petite dent»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Seaweed Sway) (n°21)
programme.desc: «The Seaweed Sway»The Seaweed Sway: Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, The Seaweed Sway. (S1, ep 19a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La famille chauve-souris / Panique sur les pistes) S6 (14/26)
programme.desc: «La famille chauve-souris / Panique sur les pistes»A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le club) S1 (43/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le club»Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»Every day is an adventure for Peppa Pig! With her family and friends there's always something to smile about, and a whole world of things to discover!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»The Greedy Gobbler: While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! Then Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears! (S1, ep 67).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (4/18)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes) S6 (16/26)
programme.desc: «Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes»The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Mayor's Race) S2 (20/26)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Mayor's Race»It's the annual Mayor's Race, and Mayor Humdinger is planning his most devious cheating scheme yet.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear) S2 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear»Paddington helps to hatch an egg but it takes ages & when it finally cracks open, he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Lagoon Lemonade) S1 (23/28)
programme.desc: «Lagoon Lemonade»Lagoon Lemonade: When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners. (S1, ep 21b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (La chaussette disparue) S1 (64/78)
programme.desc: «La chaussette disparue»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his Smell Better Machine.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»The Key: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. (S1, ep 69).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (45/78)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (46/78)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»Silly Sounds: When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. (S1, ep 46).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Maître Christophe) S1 (47/78)
programme.desc: «Maître Christophe»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Cave Barbapapas) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «The Cave Barbapapas»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La poursuite de minuit) S4 (20/20)
programme.desc: «La poursuite de minuit»It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'île au trésor perdu) S5 (1/20)
programme.desc: «L'île au trésor perdu»Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux) S6 (11/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille sauve les pirates / Drôles d'oiseaux»Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Bird Watching Turbots.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Dans la peau de Galinetta / Le concours du meilleur athlète) S6 (13/26)
programme.desc: «Dans la peau de Galinetta / Le concours du meilleur athlète»Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La famille chauve-souris / Panique sur les pistes) S6 (14/26)

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le club) S1 (43/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le club»Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Souvenirs de l'ancien temps) S4 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Souvenirs de l'ancien temps»Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La montagne blanche) S4 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La montagne blanche»Snowy Mountain: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une histoire avec Camila) S3 (15/18)
programme.desc: «Une histoire avec Camila»We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc) S6 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc»Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch! // When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler) S2 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Baby, super requin»Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (49/78)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (50/78)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (51/78)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»The Amazing Guesser: After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! (S1, ep 51).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (52/78)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa and George play hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Little Monsters) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «The Little Monsters»The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mission faucon) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Mission faucon»Blaze visits the Animal Island with AJ and Gabby. The Super Air Race is held there. Blaze and his friends want to join in too but only Blaze can't fly.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Glacier Monster Machine) S5 (10/21)
programme.desc: «Glacier Monster Machine»Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des ours dans la ville / Madame Goodway à la ferme) S6 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Des ours dans la ville / Madame Goodway à la ferme»Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille et le petit loup blanc / L'explorateur égaré) S6 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille et le petit loup blanc / L'explorateur égaré»After an unexpected snowstorm, Everest takes care of a wolf cub when they work together to make sure the Paw Patrol can find them. Touring Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole, where they encounter crocodiles?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.
